note:
Your new friend is a video game aficionado with love for all things retro, be it old tech or the newfound appreciation of retrowave and synthwave music.

This bald otherwise metalhead enjoys playing with computers with a clock frequency between 0.985 and 200 MHZ and has been an avid Linux prophet since the days when he could only surf the internet through dialup and terminals.

Toots incoherently in English (toot-toot) and Swedish (tut-tut), so don't be afraid to filter as needed.
